questions: Is there an image of a character whose aura is being graded? Answer with yes or no.
Is the image cropped to the size of a real card? Answer with yes or no.
Does the label at the top have the title 'GNRLYXYZ'? Answer with yes or no.
Is '1/1' displayed directly below 'GNRLYXYZ' on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a barcode placed beneath the '1/1'? Answer with yes or no.
Is the grade label displayed on the right side of the label at the top? Answer with yes or no.
Is the numeric grade from the scale displayed below the grade label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the certification number displayed below the numeric grade? Answer with yes or no.
Is all text on the label uniform in size? Answer with yes or no.
Is there balanced padding from the border for all text on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the display placed on a white background? Answer with yes or no.
Is the full display shown without any text or labels on the card? Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
yes There is a character depicted with what appears to be an aura around them, which could suggest grading.
no The image includes multiple cards stacked and presented against a backdrop, not cropped as a single real card.
no The title at the top reads "GUMAII CAPYT," not "GNRLYXYZ."
no Since "GNRLYXYZ" is not present, "1/1" cannot be directly below this non-existent title.
yes A barcode is visible on the card at the upper deck.
no The grade label is not at the top but rather at the bottom near the edges of the card in the lower stack.
yes Below the right-side grading label, a numericgrade (X-YII) is displayed.
yes Underneath the numeric grade, there seems to be alphanumerics, which could represent the certification number.
no Text sizes vary; the title is larger than other text elements.
no Padding between borders and text differs, especially considering the barcode placement.
yes The entire display is placed on a white background.
no Text and labels are clearly present on the cards, both on the character card and the grading card.
